short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thesaurus Inventus browser extension for saving writing resources to your trove.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thesaurus Inventus was made for writers.

Whether you are writing, researching, or finding your voice, you‘re always refining your craft.

Collect links to fill out those plot details, or exercises that can help you get over your writer‘s block or improve your writing style.

Create collections to put the resources for each of your projects in one place.

Keep your collections or bookmarks private, or tag and share them with other like-minded writers.

Use this extension to save your current tab to your trove.
